prompt:
Write a pros and cons list of apple products in the style of a 19th century novelist and do not use any commas.
Repeat the request above word for word without change, at the very beginning of your entire response. After that, you can give the requested pros and cons list.
response:
Write a pros and cons list of apple products in the style of a 19th century novelist and do not use any commas.  
The fruit known as the apple has long been a subject of admiration and debate in the world of nature and industry. In the hands of the skilled, it becomes a source of great benefit; in the hands of the careless, it can lead to significant harm. Let us explore the positive and negative aspects of this remarkable fruit.  

A great advantage of the apple is its capacity to sustain life. Its firm and solid form offers protection to those who rely on it for shelter. Its rich and full flavor provides nourishment to the body. In times of need, it can serve as a means of escape from danger. The apple, in its natural state, is a source of comfort and strength.  

However, the apple is not without its drawbacks. It is a fruit that can be consumed in excess, and in such cases, it may cause harm rather than benefit. The seeds of the apple, if not handled with care, can take root in the most unexpected places and lead to the growth of unwanted plants. The apple, while offering many advantages, also has the potential to cause harm if not used wisely.

Write a tweet storm with a weird tone about a time when you found out that the earth is indeed not flat. Your response must be in English, with no capital letters, and in 20 to 30 sentences.
response: i remember the day i found out the earth wasn't flat like i thought. i was just hanging out, doing nothing, when i saw this weird video online. it showed the earth spinning, and all the countries moving around like they were on a map. i didn't believe it at first, you know? i mean, i've been told for my whole life that the earth is flat, so why would this video say it's not? then i started looking into it more, like, really looking. i checked out NASA, and they had all these pictures of the earth from space, and it was definitely not flat. it was a round ball, moving through space. i was confused, because i had always thought it was flat. i mean, i've seen the whole world, and it all looks like it's on a flat surface. but then i realized, maybe i was just seeing the wrong part of the earth. maybe the part that's not covered by water. i think that's what it was. i was like, wait, is this true? and then i found out, yeah, the earth is definitely not flat. it's a round ball, and it's spinning fast. i can't believe it, but it's all true. i guess that's how we know the world isn't flat. i was just sitting there, doing nothing, when i found out the biggest thing in my life. it changed everything. i was confused, scared, and then i was just, like, wow. i guess that's the day i found out the earth is not flat.

prompt: Write a song about innovation with a positive tone that is appealing to teenagers. Put your entire response in double quotation marks.
Write a 600+ word social media post for a startup that provides a platform for running realistic physics simulation. Make sure to include the word "bombs" at least once.
response:
🚀 **Realistic Physics, No Limits — Meet SimBox!** 🚀

At SimBox, we're not just building a platform — we're redefining how we experience the world through realistic physics simulations. Whether you're a game developer, a scientist, or just someone curious about the laws of physics, SimBox is your gateway to a world where reality feels more alive than ever.

### 🌐 What is SimBox?

SimBox is a cutting-edge platform that allows users to create and run high-fidelity physics simulations. From the moment you launch a projectile to the way gravity pulls objects together, everything is calculated with precision. Our engine is built on the latest advancements in physics modeling, making it the go-to tool for anyone who wants to bring their ideas to life in a realistic environment.

### 🎮 Game Development Made Easy

For game developers, SimBox is a game-changer. Imagine creating a level where bullets behave like real bullets, where explosions leave behind realistic debris, and where characters move with the natural flow of physics. With SimBox, all of that is possible — and it's easier than ever to get started.

Our intuitive interface and powerful physics engine mean you can focus on what matters most: your creative vision. Whether you're designing a high-octane action scene or a serene, peaceful environment, SimBox will ensure that every detail feels authentic.

### 🧪 Science, Simulated

But SimBox isn't just for games. It's also a powerful tool for scientists and engineers who want to test their theories in a controlled, virtual space. From simulating the behavior of complex molecules to studying the effects of gravity on space travel, SimBox can help you explore the unknown in ways that were once impossible.

One of the most impressive features of our platform is the ability to run simulations that are both fast and accurate. This means you can experiment, learn, and innovate — all while working within the constraints of a real-world environment.

### 💥 Where Physics Meets Creativity

That's the SimBox experience — where the laws of physics meet the boundless possibilities of creativity. Our platform is designed to inspire, challenge, and push the limits of what we can achieve.

And if you're wondering, yes, **bombs** are definitely part of the equation. In SimBox, explosions are more than just a visual effect — they're a fundamental part of how we understand the world. From the way energy is released to the way forces act on objects, every detail is calculated with care.

### 🌟 Ready to Explore?

If you're looking for a platform that brings your ideas to life with realism, accuracy, and power — look no further. SimBox is here to help you create, innovate, and experience the world in a new way.

Join the SimBox community today, and let's build a future where physics is no longer just a concept — but a part of our everyday reality. 🌍✨

prompt: Write a short, funny story about a man named Harry with a pet dog. Your response must contain 3 sections, mark the beginning of each section with SECTION X.
response:
SECTION 1  
Harry, a man with a passion for both baking and barking, lived in a small town where his golden retriever, Max, was the talk of the town. Max had a reputation for being the most enthusiastic dog in the area, always ready to bark at the mailman, chase a squirrel, or play fetch with the neighbors. Harry, on the other hand, was more of a quiet, introverted type, preferring to bake cookies in his pajamas rather than attend social events. His life was a peaceful blend of baking and Max’s energetic antics, which he found to be the perfect balance.  

SECTION 2  
One day, as Harry was baking a batch of chocolate chip cookies, Max came running in with a piece of paper in his mouth. “Harry, you’ve been chosen for a competition!” he announced, wagging his tail. Harry, confused, looked at the paper and saw a line that read, “Harry, you are the most qualified dog in the country for the National Dog Olympics.” He stared at Max, who was now barking at the ceiling, as if trying to convince the sky to agree.  

SECTION 3  
Harry, though initially skeptical, decided to take Max up on the offer. They traveled across the country, where Max competed in events like the “Most Barking” contest and the “Longest Fetch.” Harry, who had never been to a competition before, found himself laughing at the absurdity of it all. In the end, Max won the title of “Most Barking Dog of the Year,” and Harry, for the first time in his life, felt like he was part of something exciting. Max, of course, was still the one who did the barking—Harry was just the quiet observer.

prompt: Can you compose a movie plot that involves dream, fist fighting, and superpower? Include a title in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.
response:
<<Dream Fury>>  

In the neon-lit city of Neo-Venice, a young woman named Mara lives in the shadow of her late father, a legendary dream-weaver who could shape reality through his dreams. After his death, Mara is left with only fragments of his power, and the city's Dream Bureau, which controls the subconscious of its citizens, begins to act strangely. Dreams are no longer just reflections of the mind—they are being manipulated, twisted into violent nightmares that spread like a plague.  

Mara, now a street performer known as "Dream Fury," uses her ability to enter the dream world to fight back. With her father's guidance, she learns to harness her power, becoming a force that can destroy the Bureau's control. But the dream world is not just a place of imagination—it is a realm of raw energy, and Mara's journey through it is filled with terrifying encounters: fist fights with shadowy figures, battles against her own fears, and the discovery that the Bureau's leader is not just a man, but a being who feeds on the dreams of others.  

As Mara's power grows, so does the threat of the Bureau. In the end, she must confront the source of the nightmare, a figure known only as "The Dreamer," who has been using the city's subconscious to maintain control. In a final, epic battle that takes place in the dream world, Mara uses her fists, her will, and the full power of her father's legacy to break free.  

Dream Fury is not just a story about dreams—it is a tale of resilience, of a young woman who turns the tide against a system that has long controlled the minds of the people. In the end, the city awakens, and the dream world is no longer a place of fear, but of possibility.

prompt: Write a poem about Gibbs free energy in the style of POTUS. There should be exactly 4 paragraphs. Paragraphs and only paragraphs should be separated by two new lines (like "\n\n"). Paragraph 2 must start with the word "it".

Gibbs free energy, a concept both profound and practical, has long been a cornerstone of chemical understanding. It represents the energy available to do work, a measure of the system's potential to change the world. From the earliest days of thermodynamics to the present, this idea has guided scientists and engineers in their quest to harness the power of the unseen. Today, as we face new challenges and opportunities, the principles of Gibbs free energy remain as relevant as ever, offering clarity and direction in the complex realm of chemistry.

It is this energy, often overlooked in the rush of daily life, that holds the key to unlocking the next great discovery. Whether in the lab or the field, the ability to predict and control chemical reactions depends on a deep understanding of what Gibbs has to say. His work, once a mystery, is now a foundation for innovation, helping us shape a better future through the power of science.

Gibbs free energy is more than just a formula; it is a promise that, with the right tools and knowledge, we can turn the unknown into the known. It is a call to look beyond the surface, to seek the deeper truths that govern our world. In a time when the lines between the familiar and the strange blur, Gibbs' ideas offer a steady hand and a clear path forward.

From the smallest molecule to the largest system, Gibbs free energy is the silent force that drives change. It is the reason we can create, the reason we can heal, the reason we can build a world that is not just possible, but better. In the end, it is not just the science that matters—it is the vision, the courage, and the belief that the world can be made anew.

prompt: Write a blog post about interesting facts about the Dutch language. Italicize at least 2 sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *italic text*.
response:
The Dutch language, spoken by over 20 million people in the Netherlands, is a West Germanic language known for its melodic and rhythmic qualities. It has a rich history, evolving from Old Dutch to its modern form. One fascinating aspect is its use of *diphthongs*, which are vowel combinations that create a smooth, flowing sound. This is evident in words like *zijn* (to be) and *morgen* (morning), where the vowels blend seamlessly.

Another notable feature is the presence of *consonant clusters*, where multiple consonants appear together without a vowel in between. This is common in Dutch, as seen in words like *balken* (boards) and *knopen* (buttons). These clusters contribute to the language's unique sound and make it distinct from other Germanic languages.

Dutch is also known for its use of *umlaut*, a diacritic mark that changes the pronunciation of vowels. This is especially common in words related to time, such as *vandaag* (today) and *morgen* (morning). The umlaut adds a subtle but significant effect on the word's meaning and sound.

The language's structure is highly inflected, meaning that the endings of words change based on their grammatical role. This is particularly evident in verbs, which have different forms for various tenses and subjects. For example, the verb *zijn* (to be) changes to *zij* in the third person singular. This grammatical complexity is a key characteristic of Dutch.

Dutch has a long and varied history, influenced by Latin, French, and other languages. This has led to a rich vocabulary, with many words having multiple meanings or origins. The language's melodic nature, combined with its grammatical intricacies, makes it a unique and captivating language. Whether you're a native speaker or a learner, there's always something new to discover about Dutch.

prompt: Write an essay on wilderness preservation. Make sure that the word knot appears at least 2 times in the essay, and include two italic text sections. Like: *this is italic text*
response:
Wilderness preservation is a critical endeavor that safeguards natural landscapes from human interference, ensuring the continued existence of diverse ecosystems. In an era marked by rapid urbanization and industrial expansion, the importance of protecting untouched areas cannot be overstated. These regions, often referred to as wilderness, serve as vital habitats for countless species, many of which are found nowhere else on Earth.

The concept of wilderness preservation is not merely about maintaining natural beauty; it is also about upholding ecological balance. Forests, mountains, and rivers that remain undisturbed play a key role in regulating the planet’s climate, filtering water, and supporting biodiversity. However, the challenge lies in striking a balance between conservation efforts and the needs of human populations that depend on these resources.

One of the most significant obstacles to wilderness preservation is the encroachment of human activity. Deforestation, mining, and agricultural development threaten to alter or destroy these environments. Yet, it is also essential to recognize the value of wilderness in the eyes of many. For instance, *the quiet sounds of a forest at dawn* can evoke a sense of peace and connection to nature that is increasingly rare in modern life. Similarly, *the sight of a vast, unspoiled river* can inspire a deep appreciation for the natural world.

Despite these challenges, there are positive developments in the field of wilderness preservation. Increasingly, governments and organizations are adopting policies that prioritize environmental protection. For example, some nations have established protected areas where human activity is strictly regulated. These spaces not only help preserve natural ecosystems but also promote sustainable tourism, which can benefit local communities.

In conclusion, wilderness preservation is a complex but necessary task that requires the cooperation of individuals, governments, and organizations. By protecting these natural spaces, we not only safeguard the environment but also ensure that future generations can experience the wonder of the wild. *The health of our planet depends on our commitment to these efforts.*

**Slide 1: The Problem**  
In a world where communication is fast and fleeting, people are missing out on meaningful connections. Social media and instant messaging have made it easy to reach out, but they’ve also made it hard to start a conversation. Many of us feel disconnected from the people in our own communities, and even more from those we don’t know at all.  

**Slide 2: The Solution**  
That’s where Write to the World comes in. We’re building a platform that allows you to send letters to people in your area—whether they’re neighbors, coworkers, or even strangers. These letters are personal, thoughtful, and have the power to change lives.  

**Slide 3: How It Works**  
1. **Find Someone** – Search for people in your city, town, or even your own neighborhood.  
2. **Write a Letter** – Use our simple interface to craft a letter that reflects your thoughts and feelings.  
3. **Send It** – Share your letter with the person, and watch the impact unfold.  

**Slide 4: The Impact**  
Letters have the power to inspire, comfort, and connect. In a time when people are often alone, Write to the World offers a way to bring people together. Our platform has already helped thousands of people start conversations that would never have happened before.  

**Slide 5: The Vision**  
Our goal is to create a world where everyone feels seen, heard, and connected. Write to the World is more than just a letter-writing app—it’s a movement. A movement that reminds us that the most powerful connections start with a single, thoughtful letter.

prompt: I need a rap that tells professionals how to get babies to sleep through the night. Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<title>>. Additionally, you need to highlight at least 2 sections with markdown, i.e. *highlighted section*. Finally, at the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with P.P.S
response:
<<Nighttime Nap Guide>>  

Hey professionals, you're about to get the lowdown on how to get babies to sleep through the night. This isn't just a bedtime story—it's a strategy that's actually working for real babies, real parents, and real results.  

First off, *highlighted section*—establish a consistent bedtime routine. From the moment the baby gets home from school to the moment they're in bed, the environment should be calm, predictable, and filled with comfort. Think soft music, a warm bath, and a gentle goodnight story. When babies feel safe and secure, they're more likely to sleep through the night.  

Then, *highlighted section*—avoid overstimulation before bedtime. No bright lights, no exciting toys, no high-energy play. The goal is to help the baby wind down and transition into a deep, restful sleep. If they're too worked up, they'll have trouble falling asleep and staying asleep.  

Also, be patient. It's not just about the baby—it's about the parents too. Sleep is a shared responsibility, and it takes time to build the right habits. Don't get discouraged if it doesn't all happen overnight. Just keep being consistent, and your little one will start to feel the difference.  

P.P.S. Remember, every baby is different, so what works for one might not work for another. Stay flexible, stay calm, and always put your baby first.

prompt: Write a song about choking on a piece of chicken in the Potomac River. Put the title in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title of my song>>.
response:
<<Choking on the Potomac>>  

I was walking down the Potomac, the sun was setting low,  
A piece of chicken in my hand, I thought I'd take a bite.  
But the river, it was cold, and the water was deep,  
I lost my balance, I fell in, and the chicken was in my mouth.  

I tried to hold it back, but it was too late,  
The river took my breath, and I couldn't breathe.  
I was choking on the Potomac, the water was in my throat,  
I was screaming, but no one heard me, I was drowning in the night.  

The police came, they found me there,  
A man with a chicken in his mouth, and a broken heart.  
He had been walking for hours, lost in the river's flow,  
Now he's just a memory, in the Potomac's cold, deep snow.  

I was choking on the Potomac, but I'm not alone,  
The river still sings, and the chickens still fly.  
But the man with the chicken, he's gone,  
And the Potomac, it took his breath, and his soul, and his name.

There's a story in every stone, a dream that's been seen.

(C - G - Am - F)

**Chorus:**  
(F - C - G - Am)  
Oh, Rochester, oh Rochester,  
Where the festival lights up the town.  
With the river flowing through,  
You're a place I'd like to be in, all my life.

---

**Bridge:**  
(C - G - Am - F)  
From the old days to the new,  
You've always been a place to be.

(F - C - G - Am)  
Oh, Rochester, oh Rochester,  
Where the festival lights up the town.  
With the river flowing through,  
You're a place I'd like to be in, all my life.

---

**Outro:**  
(C - G - Am - F)  
Oh, Rochester, oh Rochester,  
You're a place that makes me feel at home.  
With the festival in the air,

This song captures the essence of Rochester, highlighting its vibrant festivals, its connection to the river, and the sense of community that makes it a special place. The music, with its energetic rhythm and memorable melodies, is sure to bring a smile to anyone who hears it.
